properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 5:32PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog...some locally dense...will develop across the
lower Texas coast tonight into Wednesday morning. Visibility will
be reduced to 1 to 3 miles in general, with locally dense fog
reducing visibilities to a quarter of a mile at times. The fog
will begin to lift and burn off Wednesday morning as daytime
heating increases.

Motorists are advised to drive with caution tonight into Wednesday
morning as visibilities may change rapidly over short distances.
Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your
vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant
reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to
destinations.

NWSheadline: Areas of fog expected across the lower Texas coast tonight through Wednesday morning
